name: @prosopo/captcha
author: Prosopo

scripts.hostid: npm run cmd -- "dig +short %s.prosopo.io | tail -n1 | tee /dev/tty | nslookup | cut -d = -f 2 | head -n1 | cut -d ' ' -f 2 | sed 's/\.*$//g'"
scripts.cmd:about: perform string substitution on the command and then execute it. Make sure to use --, e.g. npm run cmd -- my args here
scripts.version: f() { npm run -w @prosopo/scripts cli -- version -v $@; npm i; }; f
scripts.ws:ls: npm run --workspaces env | grep npm_package_name | cut -d '=' -f 2
scripts.ws:about: run a command for each workspace member, exiting immediately if any command fails. Don't forget the `--` !
scripts.ws: f() { (set -e; npm run --silent ws:ls | while read -r line; do npm run -w $line $@; done); }; f
scripts.start:all: npx concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:provider" "npm run start:demo" "npm run start:bundle" --kill-others
scripts.start:all:pow: npx concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:provider" "npm run start:demo:pow" "npm run start:bundle" --kill-others
scripts.lint:dockerfile: find . \( -name 'Dockerfile' -o -name '*.dockerfile' \) ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c 'docker run --rm -i hadolint/hadolint < {} || exit 255'
scripts.docker:rust: f() { if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then FLAGS=''; else FLAGS='-it'; fi ; mkdir -p node_modules/cargo-cache && docker run --rm $FLAGS -u $(id -u):$(id -g) --cpu-quota=-1 -v $PWD:/src -v $PWD/node_modules/cargo-cache:/usr/local/cargo/registry prosopo/cargo-contract:4.1.1 "export RUST_BACKTRACE=1; $@" ;}; f
scripts.lint-rs:clippy: npm run --silent docker:rust -- 'find . -name "Cargo.toml" ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c "cargo clippy --manifest-path {} -- -D warnings -A clippy::too_many_arguments || exit 255"'
scripts.lint-rs:check: npm run --silent docker:rust -- 'find . -name "Cargo.toml" ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c "cargo check --manifest-path {} || exit 255"'
scripts.lint-rs:fmt: npm run --silent docker:rust -- 'find . -name "Cargo.toml" ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c "cargo fmt --check --manifest-path {} || exit 255"'
scripts.lint-fix-rs:fmt: npm run --silent docker:rust -- 'find . -name "Cargo.toml" ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c "cargo fmt  --manifest-path {} || exit 255"'
scripts.lint-fix-rs:clippy: npm run --silent docker:rust -- 'find . -name "Cargo.toml" ! -path '*/node_modules/*' | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c "cargo clippy --manifest-path {} --fix --allow-dirty -- -D warnings -A clippy::too_many_arguments || exit 255"'
scripts.ws:pkg: npm run --silent ws:ls | xargs -I {} npm run --silent pkgjson -- {}
scripts.ws:dir: npm run --silent ws:ls | xargs -I {} npm run --silent pkgdir -- {}
scripts.depcheck: npm run --silent ws:pkg | xargs -P 1 --verbose -I {} bash -c 'cd $(dirname {}) && npx depcheck --ignores vite,vitest,@vitest/coverage-v8,rimraf,concurrently,npm-run-all,tslib,typescript,tsx || true; echo ""'
scripts.deps:ls: npm run --silent ws:pkg | xargs -I {} bash -c 'cat {} | jq .dependencies | head -n -1 | tail -n +2' | tr -d ',' | sort | uniq
scripts.deps:dupe: npm run deps:ls | awk -F': ' 'NF {count[$1]++; lines[$1] = lines[$1] $0 "\n"} END {for (pkg in count) if (count[pkg] > 1) printf "%s", lines[pkg]}' | sort

description: Prosopo Procaptcha is a privacy-focused, secure alternative to reCAPTCHA. This repository integrates prosopo packages for development purposes.
